monq.jfa

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • monq.jfa.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    computes statistical data about an Nfa or Dfa.

    • Field Summary

      number of states with at least one epsilon move.

      shortest path to a stop state

      number of stop states found

      • getStatistics

        public static Statistics getStatistics(Nfa nfa,
                       java.io.Writer w)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        compute statistical data for a Nfa. If the given Writer is not null, regular expressions describing the shortest path to stop states are printed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
